1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.1: And these are the sons of Israel: Ruben, Simeon, Levi, Juda, Issachar, and Zabulon,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.2: Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Nephtali, Gad, and Aser.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.3: The sons of Juda: Her, Onan and Sela. These three were born to him of the Chanaanitess the daughter of Sue. And Her the firstborn of Juda, was wicked in the sight of the Lord, and he slew him.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.4: And Thamar his daughter in law bore him Phares and Zara. So all the sons of Juda were five.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.5: And the sons of Phares, were Hesron and Hamul.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.6: And the sons also of Zare: Zamri, and Ethan, and Eman, and Chalchal, and Dara, five in all.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.7:
And the sons of a Charmi:<u>
                Achar
               </u>, who troubled Israel, and sinned by the theft of<u>
                the anathema
               </u>.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.9: And the sons of Hesron that were born to him: Jerameel, and Ram, and Calubi.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.10:
And<u>
                Ram
               </u>beget Aminadab, and Aminadab beget Nahasson, prince of the children of Juda.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.11: And Nahasson beget Salma, the father of Boot.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.12: And Boot beget Obed, and Obed beget Isai.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.13: And Isai beget Eliab his firstborn, the second Abinadab, the third Simmaa,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.14: The fourth, Nathanael, the fifth Raddai,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.15: The sixth Asom, the seventh David.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.16: And their sisters were Sarvia, and Abigail. The sons of Sarvia: Abisai, Joab, and Asael, three.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.17: And Abigail bore Amasa, whose father was Jether the Ismahelite.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.18:
And<u>
                Caleb
               </u>the son of Hesron took a wife named Azuba, of whom he had Jerioth: and her sons were Jaser, and Sobab, and Ardon.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.19: And when Azuba was dead, Caleb took to wife Ephrata: who bore him Hur.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.20: And Hur beget Uri: and Uri beget Bezeleel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.21: And afterwards Hesron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Galaad, and took her to wife when he was threescore years old: and she bore him Segub.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.22: And Segub beget Jair, and he had three and twenty cities in the land of Galaad.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.23: And he took Gessur, and Aram the towns of Jair, and Canath, and the villages thereof, threescore cities. All these, the sons of Machir father of Galaad.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.24: And when Hesron was dead, Caleb went in to Ephrata. Hesron also had to wife Abia who bore him Ashur the father of Thecua.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.25: And the sons of Jerameel the firstborn of Hesron, were Ram his firstborn, and Buna, and Aram, and Asom, and Achia.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.26: And Jerameel married another wife, named Atara, who was the mother of Onam.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.27: And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerameel, were Moos, Jamin, and Achar.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.28: And Onam had sons Semei, and Jada. And the sons of Semei: Nadab, and Abisur.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.29: And the name of Abisur's wife was Abihail, who bore him Ahobban, and Molid.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.30: And the sons of Nadab were Saled, and Apphaim. And Saled died without children.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.31: But the son of Apphaim was Jesi: and Jesi beget Sesan. And Sesan beget Oholai.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.32: And the sons of Jada the brother of Semei: Jether and Jonathan. And Jether also died without children.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.33: But Jonathan beget Phaleth, and Ziza, These were the sons of Jerameel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.34: And Sesan had no sons, but daughters and a servant an Egyptian, named Jeraa.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.35: And he gave him his daughter to wife: and she bore him Ethei.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.36: And Ethei begot Nathan, and Nathan beget Zabad.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.37: And Zabad beget Ophlal, and Ophlal beget Obed.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.38: Obed beget Jehu, Jehu beget Azarias.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.39: Azarias beget Helles, and Helles begot Elasa.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.40: Elasa beget Sisamoi, Sisamoi beget Sellum,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.41: Sellum beget Icamia, and Icamia begot Elisama.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.42: Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerameel were Mesa his firstborn, who was the father of Siph: and the sons of Maresa father of Hebron.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.43: And the sons of Hebron, Core, and Thaphua, and Recem, and Samma.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.44: And Samma beget Raham, the father of Jercaam, and Recem beget Sammai.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.45: The son of Sammai, Maon: and Maon the father of Bethsur.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.46: And Epha the concubine of Caleb bore Haran, and Mesa, and Gezez. And Haran beget Gezez.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.47: And the sons of Jahaddai, Rogom, and Joathan, and Gesan, and Phalet, and Epha, and Saaph.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.48: And Maacha the concubine of Caleb bore Saber, and Tharana.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.49: And Saaph the father of Madmena beget Sue the father of Machbena, and the father of Gabaa. And the daughter of Caleb was Achsa.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.50: These were the sons of Caleb, the son of Hur the firstborn of Ephrata, Sobal the father of Cariathiarim.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.51: Salma the father of Bethlehem, Hariph the father of Bethgader.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.52:
And Sobal the father of Cariathiarim had sons:<u>
                he that saw
               </u>half of the places of rest.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.53: And of the kindred of Cariathiarim, the Jethrites, and Aphuthites, and Semathites, and Maserites. Of them came the Saraites, and Esthaolites.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.54: The sons of Salma, Bethlehem, and Netophathi, the crowns of the house of Joab, and half of the place of rest of Sarai.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__02.55: And the families of the scribes that dwell in Jabes, singing and making melody, and abiding in tents. These are the Cinites, who came of Calor (Chamath) father of the house of Rechab,
